'''Clive Selsby Revill''' ([[18 April|April 18]], [[1930]]) is a [[Wellington]] born voice actor, best known as the ''original'' voice of [http://starwars.wikia.com/wiki/Clive_Revill Emperor Palpatine] in ''The Empire Strikes Back''. Revill, who now mixes screen acting with voice-over work, provided the voice of [[Thorin]] in [[The Hobbit (2003 video game)|''The Hobbit'' (2003 video game)]], and did several unspecified additional voices.
